author: Special Correspondent
text:
A goat reportedly died after a cracker-like substance burst in its mouth while it was chewing an eatable at Kavelipalayam tank area in Punjai Puliampatti limits on Monday.

More such crackers concealed in eatables were said to have been found in the vicinity.

However, no case was registered with the police

While police sources ruled out any possibility for the explosives to be country bombs, the Forest Department has received information that local farmers had been using cracker-like substances concealed in eatables to kill wild boars in order to safeguard their fields from rampage.

Though the forest area is more than 20 km away from the location, the farmers complain that a herd of wild boar had found a habitat in the bushes in and around the tank area.
title: Goat dies after cracker bursts in mouth
